name: Nexus One
description:
Manufactured by HTC, the Nexus One features dynamic noise suppression from Audience, Inc., a large 3.7" OLED display for deep contrast and brilliant colors, and a 1GHz Qualcomm Snapdragonâ„¢ chipset for blazing speeds. Of course, it also comes with a host of popular Google applications, including Gmail, Google Voice and Google Maps Navigation.

The Nexus One is available for sale in the US to registered developers.

connectivity.cell:
3 UMTS bands (either 900/AWS/2100 MHz or 850/1900/2100 MHz)
HSDPA 7.2 Mbps
HSUPA 2 Mbps
GSM/EDGE (850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz)

additionalFeatures: Second microphone for dynamic noise suppression
